title: Enterprise Pilot to Production
shortDescription: Scale a successful enterprise pilot into full production deployment.
description: A systematic approach to transitioning enterprise AI/automation solutions from pilot phase to full production. Covers success criteria validation, stakeholder alignment, scaling strategy, and rollout planning. Essential for PMs managing enterprise deployments with multiple stakeholders and complex requirements.

prompts.note: Synthesize pilot feedback from all stakeholders and users
Calculate and validate pilot success metrics and ROI
Identify production scaling risks and mitigation strategies
Plan phased rollout roadmap across departments/regions
Document production architecture and scaling requirements
Create comprehensive production testing and validation plan

outcomes: Validated pilot success metrics and ROI documentation
